attributes.comment:
USCIS-2006-0044-0001 - Adjustment of the Immigration and Naturalization Benefit
Application and Petition Fee Schedule

The costs to form a family through adoption can already be so substantially high,
that it can exclude individuals? from forming a family due to the financial burden.

Increases, at the rates proposed, will put additional financial distance between
those who wish to pursue the adoption of a foreign orphan to complete their
family. Everyone should be given the opportunity to form a family, not only those
in the highest income brackets.

It is understood that fees for services do increase with time, however, a proposed
increase of approximately 66% far exceeds any increase in inflation.

Please reconsider the proposed increases for adoption related expenses
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Mary McGonagle
